channel.title: Private Server Router Problems
channel.description: Hi ive setup my private server and its all running fine, ive tested it on localhost and i can play on it and everything ive setup no-ip (downloaded the program and set it up) and it says its working fine with my A record i have an A record (runescapeug.zapto.org) which does not work i have a feeling that this has something to do with my router i have access to the router configuration and port forwarding is there anything i need to change to make this work? should i add a port forward? thank you!

item.title: Private Server Router Problems
item.dc:creator: @parad0x parad0x_
item.description:
@parad0x wrote:

Hi ive setup my private server and its all running fine, ive tested it on localhost and i can play on it and everything
ive setup no-ip (downloaded the program and set it up) and it says its working fine with my A record
i have an A record (runescapeug.zapto.org) which does not work
i have a feeling that this has something to do with my router
i have access to the router configuration and port forwarding
is there anything i need to change to make this work?
should i add a port forward?
thank you!

Read full topic
